item.title: Have you ever taken music production classes?
item.dc:creator: foryou
item.description:
yeah i took one over my 7th grade summer at a local university although it was only one week so all i learned was how to use ableton. didn’t learn about any actual production techniques, just learned how to use a daw. still really helpful though, i wouldn’t be where i am today without that class.
